content: **knitted hat / hipster hat in drops air piece is knitted top down in stocking stitch with double folding edge in rib ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern ai-411 yarn group c or a + a ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** s/m m/l l/xl head circumference approx 54/56 56/58 58/60 cm height with fold 24-25-26 cm **materials** drops air from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 100-100-100 g colour 16 blue needles drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 cm drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 cm drops double pointed needles size 4 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm **knitting gauge ** 19 stitches in width and 25 row vertically in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note remember that needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger needles if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller needles
